title: She Lied about Her Age .. And Size (90 day Fiance)

comments.comment: she is 100 percent taking advantage of him and his politeness. especially with how she was immediately touching/kissing him, he was obviously uncomfortable.
I'm pleased his pals didn't sugarcoat the fact that she was trashy and disrespectful. They are urging you not to trash your life.
I'm glad his friends didn't beat around the bush about her being trashy and rude. They ARE being supportive.. supportive of you not ruining your LIFE.
I don't get why he still married her after she abusively threw that cake on him.
true friends don’t ALWAYS support your actions. true friends call you out when you’re doing something dumb as fck
I have a lot of respect for Michael's friends for being honest.
I wish everyone to have group of friends like he has. Damn straight not making fun of him or excluding him, taking it seriously all the way and 100% honest
the fact that michael even defended angie from his friends saying that he takes his relationship with angie seriously angie still throws a cake at him and screaming at him.
Man, I feel bad for Michael. He seems like a genuinely nice person who actually loved her at first. Angela doesn't deserve him.
Michael was so calm, patient, and such a sweetheart. I feel like Angie is every negative stereotype people think of when it comes to Americans.
Michael seemed like such a kind, sober man who'd actually take care of his woman and respect her. Some people just don't appreciate a good thing

Dude if I was him at the airport and saw her, I'd be like "hell no, get back on the plane". Trashy, liar, and loud as hell. She's all excited because she has a guy that's out of her league wanting to marry her. He's like "damn this sucks".
Her throwing that cake in his face was infuriating. She’s literally abusive towards him.
I swear she's what gives Americans such bad rep, she didn't respect their culture, she's always yelling like she's in the right, and she just straight rude to him, his family and friends
"I'm so glad he's not short" as she stands there in her trashy Walmart spec outfit with fresh sweat stains.
I feel so bad for Michael. He was kind and respectful and treated her properly in a country that still puts women down. To bad he went for crazy
Michael's polite, even though he looks like she's slowly draining his soul. Can't help but feel for the guy
Michael deserves so much more, he is patient, willing, kind, gentle and most importantly a gentleman. But this woman just messes around with him and wastes his time,

michael's description of angela within the first 5 minutes:

1- stature bigger than expected
2- older than the photos
3- a little loud
4- too dramatic
5- overwhelming

...this looks like it's gonna end well
She ain't trashy, she's a landfill.
He's lucky to have such honest friends, they really care about him and don't want her to ruin his life

My jaw literally dropped when she put the cake in his face! He literally stood up for her when his friends called her trashy and she’s over here proving their point! This man deserves better for sure. She’s lucky he even looked twice at her old ass
There’s nothing wrong with an outspoken woman, however she’s not the ‘talks a lot’ kind of person, she’s just.. rude ️
Imagine if michael said “Wow you’re not slim!” That would’ve been gold

I felt so bad for Michael the whole time. Like, how poor is this man's self-esteem that he thinks he needs to marry a woman like this? She might be one of the most awful people I've ever seen on 90 Day Fiancé, and that's saying something. Michael, my guy, even if she were the last woman on earth, you should have just sent her home.
I love how she's like a two year old mumbling "I won't steal from the cookie jar" when she's saying her vows.
Dude, we all need in our life a group of friends like Michael has.

I can't believe how touchy she was in the bedroom even though he said he didn't want to yet. It made me feel really uncomfortable. It doesn't matter if you think he loves you, you should still ask if it's okay for you to touch him. If it was a guy wanting to go too fast, it wouldn't be okay, so this isn't okay either.
Her being so sexual and aggressive multiple times was disgusting. Shame on her for crossing his boundaries like that. Read the room weirdo
I feel bad for Americans, she is like the embodiment of the negative American stereotype.
Michael seems like such a polite sweetheart trying to make the best out of that awful situation. She is so obnoxious and disrespectful of him and his boundaries

The longer I watch this video the her actions stress me out. Shes fails to realize she is in a foreign country, just her and a camera crew... at any moment something bad could have happened and it would 85% be her fault. Also, God bless Michael! That man deserves so much better. To put up with her he has the paitence of a saint

She's so awful.
Fighting in public with the person who is meant to be your partner is embarrassing for everyone. 
Trashy is the right word.
Ugh her loudness and being all over him at the start killed me. And throwing the drink and cake like she's a big bumbling baby made my blood boil. I wish she'd just be considerate of those around her
That woman is crazy, his friend warned him, and the results in the end, her disrespecting him, and not just him, but the audience, just flashing them
He deserves better. How degrading to have a cake thrown in your face in public. He did not deserve that its not like he cheated on her.

I'm Nigerian, I think the funniest part of this is that what Micheal is taking from Angela, he would never ever take from a Nigerian woman. Like never. Talking over him, yelling at him, throwing things at him. Nigerians are very big on this respect thing and can sometimes get physical. Angela would have definitely been slapped by someone if she was Nigerian. 

Btw, I don't think it is right to hit anyone I just know that's what people do here
Ken is going for that “southern sheriff’s deputy that don’t take no sass” look

On behalf of all American men, I'd like to salute Michael for taking her out of circulation and sparing some man on this side of the Atlantic from being eaten alive. You took one for the team, Bro ... thank you ... and condolences.

This woman is absolutely disgusting. No regard for anyone or anything, she wanted some fake fairy tale and when she doesn’t get her way she throws a tantrum. Poor Michael, he clearly tries to be patient and keep her in line, she’s just that awful a person

I can't belive there's people like her out there, i'm scared. The way she just kept ineruppting the aunt omg. Btw we like these pewds so keep it up! It's intresting to see this and that everyones reactions are the same lol :)

I can't believe she humiliated her man by throwing the cake in his face in front of all people when he was just trying to apologize. I feel sorry for him.. Nigeria isn't US, its not reminiscent of a scene from a movie. This is a far away place. I was just neutral towards her but after that I just dislike her.
90 days? He's getting a lifetime of imprisonment by marrying her. I couldn't do it.

"Unveil her please"
"I'd rather not"
I've never been so uncomfortable in my life watching that man's life leave his eyes after meeting her
Her physical appearance aside, how she treats him and others is just incredibly rude and vile.
Poor Michael. When she smashed that cake in his face he should have left her immediately

I would sincerely want to thank Sive for making the screen black and not just blurring it.
Definitely the hero we deserve
can we say ironic it is that her shirt says "be your selfie" while completely lying about herself
His friends are trying to be honest and polite about their real thoughts while Michael has no idea what to do because hes so genuine and sincere, especially with his friends.
She and Big Ed would make a great couple
His eyes look so sad and disappointed but he still treats her good such a good guy.

Michael had some wise friends . She’s really not a good person whatsoever, smoked in his car without asking (I’m a smoker and i still think that’s rude as fuck) , she doesn’t take care of herself, she doesn’t respect other people not even Michael . I feel bad for him
Damn, she’s toxic and he’s so sweet. Good on his friends for trying to warn him

It feels so weird though to see a 50+ person date a 30 year old. Like that's the exact age difference between me and my mom. And also the way she keeps almost preying on him when he hasn't said anything even remotely sexual.

“You’re not short!”

Him: ……..
i love how felix had to hug maya at the end like he was subconsciously grabbing onto something soft and wholesome

"You're not short"

(Pun very much intended)
I would like to have an ounce of the amount of patience that man has
Poor Michael, I hope he’s since found the strength to leave her…he deserves way better! Poor guy ️
There is a part in every man that tells him “no” when encountering a woman like that. Sadly, few men lack this instinct. My greatest condolences Michael….
I have a lot of respect for Michaels friends for being honest.
Bro Micheal deserved so much better he’s such a nice guy I’m glad his friends saw her toxic behaviour and told it to him straight on

For anyone just now watching this,

In the latest season, she shows up to his family house (Nigeria) unannounced in the middle of the night and rips apart his car because he didn’t come out.

She flirts with every man she comes into contact with and even went as far as to meet a man in Canada but accuses Michael is cheating on her instead and thus, is extremely violent to him.

Michael is still quiet and oppressed.
19:38 you can see how horrified pewds is lmao
never was a huge fan of 90 day fiance until a streamer i watch got me hooked on it. i swear i cannot get enough of watching crazy people date other crazy people.
Every time she hugs him it looks like he's being tackled by an NFL linebacker
Bro he knew her so well that he brought her cake to apologize and she didn't even respect he was uncomfortable w stuff... Abusive af as well, he deserved better
She totally overshadows the fact that he sent a "you're beautiful today" message to a random stranger...
She is the definition of "If Humpty Dumpty and Nikocado Avocado had a daughter"
that intro of angela is terrifying because she knows that she’s an ultra-catfish and she doesn’t care

Man when she smashed the cake in his face I would seriously be seeing what would be involved with getting my foreign fiancé deported lol

So she lied about her age, she lied about her appearance, can't give him the kids he wants, is loud and obnoxious, disrespects his friends, disrespects him yet he still married her.
Why is she literally exactly like the stereotype of the typical American karen?
I cant even come up with words to describe how disturbing this relationship is. Like its not necessarily....wrong...but it just feels so wrong....like a predator eating a baby or something.
She is so disrespectful. How could you disrespect the man you love like that

Lmao this lady just straight up lusting after him  He's such a kind dude, I'm gonna be praying for him cause he deserves better

And then she cheats and gets arrested for 5 years
When she put the cake in his face I felt so bad for the guy she is mean!
This couple is so funny from an South African point of view.. from the episodes I've seen the drama never ends from both sides  wait till they speak about kids
I love how he looks at her with actual disgust

I almost cried when she threw the cake in his face. Absolutely horrible, I feel like some people because of their anger issues they have been moving through levels of how to behave and so it's perfectly normal for her to throw an entire cake in someone's face. For me that's almost a level 5 of disrespect. For her it's a level 1
When they got married. I knew it wouldn't take 5 minutes for sh!t to go down XD
Some people are just intolerable... she is one of those people.
Michael doesn't even look bad! I couldn't stop shaking my head and say: "You can get so much better, Michael."
Felix screaming in horror when she flashed her bazongas is unbelievably hilarious

These are always so awful, as I feel the catfishee is being obligated to not be a sudden dick, and the cat fisher is just as they always were. An unfortunate situation with no good outcomes. I can’t imagine the sudden horror a lot of these people experience once they are suddenly put into a situation where they realized they’ve been catfished.
